headline: CSX Modernizes Data Platform with Infosys & Microsoft
summary: Infosys (NSE: INFY) (BSE: INFY) (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting, today announced the successful completion of a major data modernization program for CSX Corporation (NASDAQ: CSX), a leading rail-based freight transportation company. Built using Infosys Topaz™, an AI-first set of services, solutions and platforms using generative AI technologies, Microsoft Fabric and Microsoft Purview, the transformation is one of the largest deployments of its kin

content.title: CSX Modernizes Data Platform with Infosys & Microsoft

Built using Infosys Topaz™, an AI-first set of services, solutions and platforms using generative AI technologies, Microsoft Fabric and Microsoft Purview, the transformation is one of the largest deployments of its kin
